AIGP - Artificial Intelligence Game Platform

A platform dedicated to assisting game developers in analyzing their game ideas using modern AI technologies. The goal of the website is to provide comprehensive support to developers at all stages of game development, from idea analysis to cost estimation and task execution.

Idea Analysis & Recommendations

Utilize AI tools to transform game ideas into detailed plans, identifying opportunities and challenges while offering personalized recommendations to enhance design and mechanics.

Cost Estimation

A tool to estimate costs based on the provided details.

Task Management

Provide actionable steps for major project tasks. Suggestions to enhance productivity.
